title: About Me
texts: Hi, I am a first year Computer Science Master student at the University of California - San Diego. I'm currently working with Prof. Yian Ma on a project related to Active Learning.

I received my bachelor's degree from the University of Hong Kong. Previously I worked on the COVID-19 analysis & Disease Prevention System project under the supervision of Prof. Eric Schuldenfrei and Prof. Hayden Kwok-Hay So. I also spent a summer working with Prof. Hengshuang Zhao on a 3D Scene Reconstruction and Segmentation project.
My research interests include Learning Theory and Empirical Reinforcement Learning. In addition, I have a strong passion for photography, welcome to visit my Photo Gallery.

I'm looking for 2025-26 new grad opportunities in the Quantitative Analysis / Machine Learning / Software Engineering fields. Feel free to contact me if you have any relevant opportunities or suggestions.
